explains: n. 爱国主义，爱国精神
wordGroup: patriotism education 爱国主义教育

sentences.en: His friends have a newfound sense of patriotism.
sentences.cn: 他的朋友们有一种新萌生的爱国主义意识。
爱国主义是每个政客的惯用伎俩。

sentences.en: He was a country boy who had joined the army out of a sense of patriotism and adventure.
sentences.cn: 他是个乡下小伙子，出于爱国心和冒险精神参了军。
